title: Apple boosting trade-in credit on select iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Watch models this month
content:
Is it time for an upgrade? From now until May 31, you can receive between $10 to $50 extra trade-in credit on eligible devices. This deal is for customers in both the US and the UK. However, just days ago, Apple lowered trade-in values for Mac, iPad, and Apple Watch models.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple boosting trade-in credit on select iPhone, iPad, Mac, and Watch models this month appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: From now until May 31, you can receive between $10 to $50 extra trade-in credit when trading in an eligible device.
